name: GALACTIC KEEP: DICE BATTLES A Tabletop RPG on PC & iOS
blurb: Galactic Keep: Dice Battles is a sci-fi tabletop-styled RPG for iOS and PC. Players roll a die to explore maps and battle enemies!

rewards.reward: GALACTIC CITIZEN: You pledge your support to the game. Thanks! You will have your name posted as a supporter on the Galactic Keep website. BONUS: You get to post comments and see exclusive backer content on Kickstarter!

ADVENTURER: The journey begins! You receive A COPY OF THE GAME on iOS (universal). You also get a digital copy of the original Galactic Keep: Dice Battles soundtrack AND an exclusive kickstarter-backer-only PLAYABLE CHARACTER and all exclusive KS BONUS items that will be unlocked throughout the campaign! You will also have your name posted as a supporter on the Galactic Keep website.

BLADE WARRIOR: Like cool swords? Receive the 'Master of Blades' Weapon Pack DLC with your digital copy of the game which includes 3 swords and 3 sword upgrades. You also get the exclusive 'kickstarter backer' character and the original soundtrack digitally (and all other ADVENTURER rewards).

HEAVY WARRIOR: Like gigantic and very destructive weapons? Receive the 'Massive Damage' Weapon Pack DLC with your digital copy of the game which includes 3 'heavy' weapons and 3 weapon upgrades. You also get the exclusive 'kickstarter backer' character and the original soundtrack digitally (and all other ADVENTURER rewards).

ALIEN WARRIOR: Like weird alien tech? Receive the 'Alien Weirdware' Weapon Pack DLC with your digital copy of the game  which includes 3 strange, alien weapons and 3 weapon upgrades. You also get the exclusive 'kickstarter backer' character and the original soundtrack digitally (and all other ADVENTURER rewards).

TECHNOLOGICAL WIZARD: What was once only available on little screens is magically expanded to play on something much larger. Get the PC VERSION OF THE GAME, 100% DRM FREE as a digital download. This reward is automatically included in all tiers above $20! You'll also get all of the ADVENTURER rewards, including the iOS version!

ULTIMATE WARRIOR: You'll be off to a good start! You receive ALL THREE DLC weapon packs ('Master of Blades', 'Massive Damage' and 'Alien Weirdware') with your digital copy of the game. That's NINE extra weapons plus NINE weapon upgrades to do with as you choose! You also get the exclusive 'kickstarter backer' CHARACTER and the original soundtrack digitally (and all other ADVENTURER rewards).

EXPLORER: Receive the Kickstarter exclusive game map 'THE GREY RING GAUNTLET'. This map includes a unique mission and objectives, some rare and unique creatures to defeat, several hidden weapon caches and an exclusive CARTOGRAPHER special skill to use. You will also receive all of the ULTIMATE WARRIOR and ADVENTURER rewards.

EARLY BIRD INTELLIGENCE ROLL: Get an ACTUAL GALACTIC KEEP D10 DIE, from a limited edition of 150 hand-crafted dice! A harbinger of what could be (if we were to make a physical version of the game), this die is etched with an original design on every side. The zero on the die is etched with the 'balthwot head' seen in the Galactic Keep logo. We'll post images as soon as we receive the prototype! You also receive the EXPLORER, ULTIMATE WARRIOR and ADVENTURER rewards. I think you just rolled a critical hit.

CAPTAIN: Receive one Kickstarter-exclusive HIRELING, a character that will fight by your side, for use in the game! Defeat things faster, get a new drinking buddy and fill out your crew all at the same time! Also receive the EXPLORER, ULTIMATE WARRIOR and ADVENTURER rewards.

TIMEMASTER: Receive all -future- updates and game DLC PACKS FOR FREE along with a limited edition T-SHIRT!  Also receive a powerful Kickstarter-exclusive TIME DEVICE for use in the game. Get the CAPTAIN, EXPLORER, ULTIMATE WARRIOR and ADVENTURER rewards too!

CULTURED PIRATE: Receive a hand-made, limited edition silkscreen print of a creature featured in Galactic Keep. The 2 color, 5"x8" print will be signed and numbered by the artist (Rob Lemon, creator of the game). Also receive all of the TIMEMASTER, CAPTAIN, EXPLORER, ULTIMATE WARRIOR and ADVENTURER rewards.

MERCHANT MOGUL: Being a mogul, you're not ready to sit back and invest from behind a veil of darkness. You'd rather stand front and center! Firstly, you will receive a credit in the game. Secondly, as a visual representation fo your fiscal power you will receive a FOIL, powered up version of the character of your choice. You also get THE GOLD SET: a special and exclusive golden suit of armor, a golden sword and a unique golden artifact. All are unique pieces of golden bling and are some of the most powerful items in the game. You also receive all of the TIMEMASTER, CAPTAIN, EXPLORER, ULTIMATE WARRIOR and ADVENTURER rewards!

GALACTIC ARTISAN: You get one ORIGINAL PIECE OF ART from the game. Choose your favorite creature or character and we will send you the original pencil artwork (if that art has not already been awarded to someone else). Also receive the MERCHANT MOGUL, TIMEMASTER, CAPTAIN, EXPLORER, ULTIMATE WARRIOR and ADVENTURER rewards! You are a shining gold artisan, a time-traveling merchant captain who is the ultimate warrior of adventure exploration. Yes you are.

CREATURE HANDLER: You are invited to create ONE ENEMY CREATURE to be featured in the game! Give us a description. We'll draw it up, create stats for it and make it into a foreboding beast that will appear in the game. You also receive the MERCHANT MOGUL, TIMEMASTER, CAPTAIN, EXPLORER, ULTIMATE WARRIOR and ADVENTURER rewards. To recap, you get a CREATURE of your design in the game, the GOLD SET of items, one FOIL character of your choice, a credit in the game, the in-game TIME DEVICE, the HIRELING, the exclusive MAP and SPECIAL SKILL, the T-SHIRT, all nine unique WEAPONS, the special CHARACTER, the BONUS ITEMS, the game SOUNDTRACK digitally...and the GAME on iOS, of course! You're mopping up.

MISSION SPECIALIST: Your likeness is used to create a CHARACTER IN THE GAME with a full backstory and all the fixins! Send us a photo and short description so you can appear as a PLAYABLE CHARACTER in Galactic Keep: Dice Battles...and we'll also send you the ORIGINAL ARTWORK of your character! You will also receive the CREATURE HANDLER, MERCHANT MOGUL, TIMEMASTER, CAPTAIN, EXPLORER, ULTIMATE WARRIOR and ADVENTURER rewards...and everything we ever add to the game!
